name: Urbanz Christchurch
description:
Come and stay in the centre of Christchurch in our super centrally located loft style building, Urbanz. It's an easy walk to all city sights including the Cardboard Cathedral, Tram, historic New Regent Street, Avon River, entertainment venues and the best bars and restaurants. 

All our dorms offer king-single size bunk beds, thick mattresses, lockers, plus USB and power-up points. All Double rooms offer TV, plus USB and power-up points with shared and ensuite bathrooms available, come and relax with us. 

We offer free and unlimited WiFi. Parking can be found right next door, with discount for Urbanz Guests for only $17 per 24 hours. Pay at reception (NOT at the machine). No hidden charges or credit card surcharge.  

Urbanz has the best guest kitchen in the country, recently renovated with 8 distinct cooking stations, ovens, pots & pans included - everything you'll need to cook up a storm. We also have a huge lounge with couches, power points, a pool table, Netflix, movies and gas fireplaces. 

Airport bus number 29 stops 50 metres across the road (leaves airport every 30 minutes, 6am to 10.30pm, $4 adult one way).  For late night arrivals you can book a shuttle at www.supershuttle.co.nz or take an Uber.  The central bus interchange for all long and local buses is less than 10 minute walk. 

We have a free onsite jobs board and staff can assist in completing tax applications etc. 

Reception is open from 8am to 9pm in peak Summer season - with reduced operating hours in Winter and shoulder seasons.  
After hours check in available with door code - sent by e-mail on arrival day.

houseRules.notes:
Standard Policies

Urbanz Reception is open from 8:00am to 9:00pm. 

Urbanz has a 'No-Noise' after 10pm. We ask that all guests are considerate of their room mates 

Passport, drivers licence or Government Issued ID in English is necessary at check-in for each guest, otherwise unfortunately we cannot allow you to stay. 

After hours / Late check-in is available but you MUST notify us in advance. Instructions are sent by e-mail between 1-3 days ahead of arrival. If arriving afterhours and staying 1-2 nights only, your debit or credit card used for booking will be charged prior to arrival plus a 2.5% processing surcharge. 

Cancellations must be made more than 48 hours prior to the day of arrival. Cancellations made within 48 hours from the date of arrival will incur additional charges equivalent to the first night's accommodation. No Shows will be charged the first nights accommodation.

Check-in is available after 9am, however please note that beds/rooms will not be ready until after 2pm. We have storage facilities for the interim and common areas are free for use.

We do not allow minors under the age of 17 in shared rooms, with or without guardians. Families are welcome, but would be required to book an entire room. Alternatively, book our Family Rooms, suitable for groups of 4-8 persons.

Please note that we cannot always guarantee that guests from a group booking will be in the same room or any booking will be in the same room for the duration of the stay, though we will always try our best!

A 2.5% credit card surcharge applies to any payment made using a credit card, this includes travel cards. 

Towels and Linen is provided for all guests, free of charge. Please do not use your own bed linens, our team can provide you with additional blankets at no extra cost. 

We are a non-smoking property. Any guest caught vaping or smoking indoors will be asked to check-out immediately and/or fined an apprpriate cleaning charge.
